name: CrowdStrike Falcon Spotlight
description: This plugin is used to fetch Vulnerabilities from the Exposure Management > Vulnerability Management > Vulnerabilities page of the CrowdStrike tenant. This plugin does not support any actions on Vulnerabilities in CrowdStrike tenant.

configuration.label: Base URL
configuration.description: Base URL of CrowdStrike instance. e.g. https://api.crowdstrike.com

configuration.label: Client ID
configuration.description: Client ID generated from the CrowdStrike platform. Client ID can be generated from the 'Support and resources > API clients and keys' page.

configuration.label: Client Secret
configuration.description: Client Secret generated from the CrowdStrike platform. Client Secret can be generated from the 'Support and resources > API clients and keys' page.

configuration.label: Initial Range (in days)
configuration.description: Number of days to pull the data for the initial run. Value must be between 0 and 2^62.
